basics.name: Hunter Davis
basics.label: Programmer
basics.summary: I write books, release software, hack on hardware, ponder ideas and generally have a good time.

work.summary: Rhapsody is a music streaming service company.  I serve as one of the senior android engineers.  I mentor junior employees and Implement our fundamental architecture. Recent highlights include encryption algorithms, threading and inter-process messaging architecture. waveform equalization.
highlights: Three patent applications currently in review.
Teach a fundamentals of Computer Science with a focus on Android course weekly.
Architected and implemented 3rd party Rhapsody implementations with Audi, Ford, Fan.tv, and more
Mentor junior employees and provide assistance with career advancement.

education.studyType: Masters, focus in Scientific Computing and Artificial Intelligence
Awarded "Most Outstanding Project in Computer Science" for senior project.

publications.name: Video compression for 3d media
publications.summary: Innovative middle-out compression algorithm that changes the way we store data.

references.name: Erlich Bachman
references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Richard, his performance working as a consultant for Main St. Company proved that he will be a valuable addition to any company.
